Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how enterprises are moving from automation to true AI autonomy. This session explores the vision for scalable, agentic platforms that deliver measurable business impact.

See Microsoft's Agent Framework in action, watch how autonomous agents orchestrate complex Know Your Customer processes while ensuring compliance and audit traceability. Experience seamless integration with Copilot Studio and Azure AI, showcasing rapid development of autonomous production-ready agentic workflows.
